text: Human boy, I do not have much time left, so listen to me very carefully!

2.name: Ylarus
text: I am Ylarus, God of Time.
Adan has been destroyed once again.
Each time the wizard sacrifices the human girl you call Grace, Adan ignites, annihilating all life, with yourself and the wizard included.
Human boy, the destruction of Adan and with that his own demise is not his intend! However, it is imperative that you prevent its recurrence!
I have chosen you for this task because of the bond you share with the human girl.
I have rewound time for you before, but my powers are weakening.
Now, I no longer possess the strength for another reversal.
Thus, I have embedded a portion of my essence within this crystal.
This crystal enables you to {COLOR=BLUE}rewind time by 12 hours before this disaster strikes, as often as needed.
{SPEED=0.5}My time has come to an end... Take the crystal now! And use it!
What the...
This is heavy.
Ylarus, the God of Time...
So, in about 12 hours, around 19:30 tonight, Grace will die, and Adan will burn.
Ylarus won't intervene any further, so I have to use this crystal to rewind time before 19:30!
If I don't, Grace will die, Adan will be destroyed, and I'll die too.
Is this really all on my shoulders now?
*Sigh* This is a lot to take in.
Okay! Grace needs me, but I cannot be there just yet. Hold on, Grace! I will come back for you!
When the time is right...
